title: Strengthening Higher Education Language Learning and Research Competencies Through Institutional Repository (IR) Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Focuses on systematically utilizing institutional repository resources (research reports, pedagogical content, etc.) to strengthen workplace relevance for practicing professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can independently search for and evaluate language learning/research materials aligned with their purpose in the institutional repository (IR).
Learners can design practical language education content using digital resources stored in the IR.
Learners can collaborate with peer learners and researchers to share IR-based language research outcomes and propose improvements.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
